price: フィルアウン*は引き返し、自分の策略を練り上げてから、約束（の日）に現れた。
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā fir'ʿawnu fajamaʿa kaydahu thumma atā
